alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Grainger; Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 2:23PM CST until February 19 at 2:24PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Russell and Scott Counties. Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Scott and Hancock Counties. Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Claiborne and Hancock Counties. Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Union and Claiborne Counties. Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Lee and Hancock Counties. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Marion, Sequatchie and Bledsoe Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Tennessee... Emory River At Oakdale TN affecting Morgan and Roane Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River above Tazewell TN. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Action stage. At 12.0 feet, Flooding of pasture land near Grissom Island begins. The city of Tazewell, Tennessee is not affected by flooding of the Clinch River. At 16.0 feet, Extensive flooding of pasture land around Grissom Island occurs. The city of Tazewell, Tennessee is not affected by flooding of the Clinch River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 15.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 430 PM EST /330 PM CST/.
